name: The Sorcerer (AlbaM9)
description:
Woud you imagine if some day you wake up in a shadow world?

Is the case of this magician. He started to play with dark dangerous magic, and it always has consequences..... 

Would you help the magician to get his powers back and escape?

The sorcerer is a 2D roguelike that now is in development, this is a demo.

You starts with one random element that you would get power ups later to improve your damage, but you couldnt change the element. The enemies will spawn randomly in the battle rooms and they will be elementals too (depends of your element you would have the advantage or not) and your goal is defeat all de enemies and the final boss of the level.

Controller:

- WASD to movement

- Keyboard Arrows to shoot
